snippet.title: Chronicles of the Wolf | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Migami Games collaborates with PQube and PixelHeart in a star-studded collaboration of industry veterans. With narration by Robert Belgrade, and guest tracks by Oscar Araujo, the composer of the Castlevania Lords of Shadow.

Adding to the excitement, the game features a special guest appearance from Bloodless, the iconic character from the critically acclaimed Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night series voiced by Kira Buckland.

The legend of the Beast of Gévaudan comes to life in Chronicles of the Wolf, a haunting new metroidvania developed by Migami Games. launching digitally on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox, and Steam, with physical editions for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 5 arriving in Summer 2025.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2371890/Chronicles_of_the_Wolf/

“Bloodstained” is a trademark and/or registered trademark of ArtPlay, Inc.. Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night is developed by Artplay, Inc.. Published by 505 Games S.p.A

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pqube?lang=en
